1461.Applications: Overlay of carbon and low-alloy steels for resistance to corrosion, erosion, or abrasion. 410 has higher hardness and is used in valve seats to obtain better galling resistance. Normally to obtain adequate ductility, preheat and post-weld heat-treatment are required.
1461.Suitable_For: For welding or repairing 12% Cr air-hardenable stainless steels like types 410, 416, 420, 431 and cast C-15, W.Nr: 1.4008, 1.4000, 1.4006, X8Cr14, X6Cr13, X10Cr13 and cast steels.
